headline.main: BURMA IS AT WAR WITH U.S., BRITAIN; Declaration Follows Granting of 'Independence,' According to Tokyo Broadcasts

lead_paragraph: Japan "granted independence" to occupied Burma yesterday, announced the "withdrawal of the Japanese military administration" and then transmitted "a declaration of war" by Burma against the United States and Great Britain.
abstract: Burma declares war against GB and US
snippet: Japan "granted independence" to occupied Burma yesterday, announced the "withdrawal of the Japanese military administration" and then transmitted "a declaration of war" by Burma against the United States and Great Britain....
